titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, 16. 5. 1935
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 188; Cambridge Letters, S. 259; WiC, S. 242).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: This is only to confirm the statement I made in our conversation last Tuesday that I am resigning as Miss Ambrose's examiner for her Ph.D. degree.
